Newton.Fred R. Hayward House: The Fred R. Hayward House is a historic house at 1547 Centre Street in Newton, Massachusetts. This large ​2 1⁄2-story stucco-clad house was designed by Winchester architect Robert Coit, and built in 1912. Mostly rectangular in its massing with a hip roof, there are two forward-facing gables framing the main entry, the right one projecting slightly.
